title: 08/09/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/09/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses Josh Allen's new deal. Will the move get some other notable QBs paid? NBC's Peter King discusses how realistic he is that Peyton Manning would one day be the NFL Commissioner. And with the closing ceremonies yesterday, Dan recaps the 2020 Tokyo Olympics.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
